metadata.title: Placement Overview | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Discover our exceptional placement records with top recruiting companies like Disney+ Hotstar, Google, Autodesk, and more. Our students secure high-paying positions across leading tech and corporate organizations.

hero.title: Placement Overview
hero.intro: Empowering students to achieve their career aspirations through industry partnerships, skill development, and comprehensive placement support.

topPlacements.name: Durga Prasad Chauhan
topPlacements.comment: The placement cell's guidance and rigorous preparation helped me secure my dream role. The technical training and mock interviews were invaluable.

topPlacements.name: Anmol Singh Negi
topPlacements.comment: Shivalik's industry-aligned curriculum and hands-on projects gave me the edge I needed to excel in technical interviews.

topPlacements.name: Varun Kohli
topPlacements.comment: The coding clubs and competitive programming culture here prepared me exceptionally well for Google's rigorous selection process.

topPlacements.name: Vishal
topPlacements.comment: Faculty mentorship and real-world projects helped me build a strong portfolio that stood out during placements.

topPlacements.name: Shubham Joshi
topPlacements.comment: The soft skills training and personality development sessions boosted my confidence significantly during interviews.

topPlacements.name: Saurabh Chauhan
topPlacements.comment: The exposure to consulting methodologies and business analytics prepared me perfectly for a career in consulting.

topPlacements.name: Priyanka Dey
topPlacements.comment: Working on AI and ML projects during my course gave me practical experience that employers truly valued.

topPlacements.name: Nikita Agarwal
topPlacements.comment: The entrepreneurship cell and startup exposure helped me understand the business side of technology.

topPlacements.name: Arihant Jain
topPlacements.comment: The placement team's personalized approach ensured I was well-prepared for every stage of the recruitment process.

affiliations.title: Affiliation and Approval
affiliations.description: Shivalik College is a name you can trust! We are proudly accredited by NAAC with an A+ grade, and our programs also have course-specific accreditations and approvals from AICTE, UTU, UBTER, PCI, MHRD, and SDSUU.
